remarks:
Split a biconditional and distribute quantifier.  Restricted quantifier version of ~ albiim .  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2012.) 

---

 Split a biconditional and distribute quantifier.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2012.)
statement: ralbiim $p |- ( A. x e. A ( ph <-> ps ) <-> ( A. x e. A ( ph -> ps ) /\ A. x e. A ( ps -> ph ) ) ) $.
